title: Don’t Let Good Photos Get Lost in the Weeds
tags: Prune Your Photos (2026);Prune Your Photos (2026)9 February 2026 at 1:00 pm Zoom Meeting ID: 81174855875 Learn to edit the story of a photo both after and before snapping the shutter. This interactive workshop explores how simple edits and thoughtful composition can transform an image. You’ll learn to see your garden with an artist’s eyeAndrew LinkeAndrew Linke
